resources.string: The Devcomms app is coded by the community members. Architecturally, this is built with the new Android Architecture components and Firestore. All of this is coded natively. \n\nSee the repo and read more at: ºhttps://github.com/GDLDevComms/DevComms

DevComms is a community founded by leaders of different technical communities to promote the grow of technical skills in Guadalajara and Mexico. We are happy to bring content, software and help to members of different communities.
